thread.title: Devin Nunes: Trump and Transition Team Members Surveilled–Not In Connection to Russia
thread.title_full: Devin Nunes: Trump and Transition Team Members Surveilled–Not In Connection to Russia

author: Michelle Moons
title: Devin Nunes: Trump and Transition Team Members Surveilled–Not In Connection to Russia
text: House Intelligence Committee Chair Rep. Devin Nunes announced Wednesday that members of President Donald Trump’s transition team, including the President-elect, were “incidentally” surveilled by the intelligence community, additional names of the transition team were “unmasked,” and that the information was not obtained in relation to Russia.
